name: Blood Fury Tattoo
description: This tattoo evokes fury in its form and colors. The tattoo has 10 charges, and it regains all expended charges daily at dawn. Bloodthirsty Strike: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can expend 1 charge to deal an extra 4d6 Necrotic damage. Sanguine Recall: When you kill a creature, you can expend 1 charge to regain Hit Points equal to the Necrotic damage you dealt with the Bloodthirsty Strike feature.
